title: Following Mark Cubans’ Lead, Scottie Pippen Backs Bitcoin Despite Major Market Plunge
description: Scottie Pippen remains steadfast in his beliefs. The basketball legend quickly became the talk of the town when he began posting about his positive opinion on a specific matter– Bitcoin. Billionaire Mark Cuban might agree with him. Just last year, Pippen made a surprising prediction on social media. And now he’s doing it again. As […]The post Following Mark Cubans’ Lead, Scottie Pippen Backs Bitcoin Despite Major Market Plunge appeared first on EssentiallySports.

title: Man pleads guilty in failed ransom plot that may have been linked to $240M crypto heist
description: A Florida man has pleaded guilty in connection with the carjacking and kidnapping of a Connecticut couple, in what authorities call a failed ransom plot that may have been linked to a $240 million cryptocurrency heist. Michael Rivas was one of six men arrested after the series of events in Danbury on Aug. 25. He has plead guilty Thursday to kidnapping and conspiracy in federal court in Hartford and is set to be sentenced in May. The couple were assaulted but survived the ordeal. Danbury police say the FBI was investigating whether the couple's son was involved in a Bitcoin theft a week before...

title: Are the elite actually investing in Bitcoin, or is it a fad?
description: Bitcoin and the cryptocurrency asset class are likely here to stay.
